html:
him whom man despiseth/nations abhorreth/servant of rulers/Kings…arise/princes…worship. In a great contrast, men despise the servant, showing their lack of respect for the Master (Luke 10:16), but kings will yet arise in respect to him (Judg. 3:20) and princes will worship him (49:23; 60:3, 11, 16). These may well be kings and princes (or priests) before God, having received the fulness of the priesthood in the temple.

faithful. The Lord keeps all his promises; he never fails.
